  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BSONDocumentBuffer
    A simple wrapper around a byte array that is the representation of a single BSON document.
    CommandResult  
    CreateCollectionOptions  
    DBRef  
    Document
    A representation of a document as a Map.
    Index
    Represents an index to create on the database.
    Index.Builder  
    Index.GeoKey  
    Index.OrderedKey
    Contains the pair that is the field name and the ordering value for each key of an index
    MappingFuture<U,V>
    A future that can map from another Future of type U to a Future of type V.
    MongoClientOptions
    Various settings to control the behavior of a MongoClient.
    MongoClientOptions.Builder
    A builder for MongoClientOptions so that MongoClientOptions can be immutable, and to support easier construction through chaining.
    MongoClients  
    MongoClientURI
    Represents a URI which can be used to create a MongoClient instance.
    MongoCollectionOptions  
    MongoCollectionOptions.Builder  
    MongoCredential
    Represents credentials to authenticate to a mongo server, as well as the source of the credentials and the authentication mechanism to use.
    MongoDatabaseOptions  
    MongoDatabaseOptions.Builder  
    MongoNamespace  
    MongoQueryCursor<T>  
    QueryBuilder  
    QueryOperators
    MongoDB keywords for various query operations.
    QueryOptions  
    ReadPreference
    An abstract class that represents preferred replica set members to which a query or command can be sent.
    ServerCursor
    A class representing a cursor id associated with a server address (host/port) Since cursor ids are only useful in the context of a single MongoDB server process, you need both values to do a getMore on the cursor.
    Sort  
    TaggableReadPreference
    Abstract class for all preference which can be combined with tags
    WriteConcern
    WriteConcern control the acknowledgment of write operations with various options.
    WriteResult

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MongoClientException
    A base class for exceptions indicating a failure condition within the driver.
    MongoCursorNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a getmore is executed but the cursorId is no longer available on the server
    MongoException
    A general exception raised in response to some sort of problem communicating with a MongoDB server.
    MongoInternalException
    An exception that indicates a logical error in the driver.
    MongoInterruptedException
    A non-checked exception indicating that the driver has been interrupted by a call to Thread.interrupt.
    MongoInvalidDocumentException
    This exception is thrown if the driver encounters a document that is invalid.
    MongoQueryFailureException
